thread.title: Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader to make Ghana laugh in Nov!
thread.title_full: Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader to make Ghana laugh in Nov!

title: Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader to make Ghana laugh in Nov!
text:
Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader to make Ghana laugh in Nov! Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader to make Ghana laugh in Nov! 2.5 5 
Published October 26th, 2015 - 11:25 GMT via SyndiGate.info Rate Article: Facebook Twitter Google+ Linkedin Pinterest Delicious Stumbleupon Digg Reddit Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader is set to perform in Africa next month. (Clawang.cf) 
Hilarious Palestinian-American comedian Aron Kader is hailing all the way from Hollywood to Ghana this November 7, reported Ghana Web. 
The funnyman will be performing alongside Ghanaian comedian DKB at the Kempinski Gold Coast Hotel. 
Kader , 41, is famous for performing in the Axis of Evil Comedy Tour and the New York Arab American Comedy Festival. 
A member of the Levantine Cultural Center's stand-up comedy show the Sultans of Satire since 2005, Kader can also be seen in Palestinian-Italian comedian Dean Obeidalah's documentary The Muslims Are Coming. 
The Muslims Are Coming follows the journey of American comics of Muslim faith who embark on a U.S. tour designed to combat prejudice and misinformation regarding Islam through humor and interaction. 
In 2009, Kader offered his comedic expertise to budding comics at the month-long Comedy Cafe, which he had organized as part of the Dubai Shopping Festival. Advertisement Â© 2000 - 2015 Al Bawaba (www.albawaba.com) Rate Article:
